segments.text: Have you any evening bus tour ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we have . The city is famous for its beautiful evening scenery .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have heard of that before . When shall we start ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It starts at 7:00 and lasts 3 hours .
segments.speaker: S2
